that <WG2443> <WG991> 'seeing they may see, <WG991> and <WG2532> not <WG3361> perceive; <WG1492> and <WG2532> hearing <WG191> they may hear, <WG191> and <WG2532> not <WG3361> understand; <WG4920> lest perhaps <WG3379> they should turn <WG1994> again, <WG2532> and their sins <WG265> should be forgiven <WG863> them. <WG846>'"
